name: automaton
description: Retrieve information regarding Lord Bottington's creation.

name: byname
description: Change the byname (nickname) of Lord Bottington. (Admin only)

name: eventhandler
description: Configure Lord Bottington's usage and directives. (Admin Only)

name: help
description: Receive a list of OR assistance with Lord Bottington's directives -- organized by category.

name: patron
description: Enable patron (premium) features for your guild. (Admin Only)

name: ping
description: Inquire of the latency of Lord Bottington.

name: updates
description: Retrieve the latest important update information regarding Lord Bottington.

name: vote
description: Vote for the automaton and receive a reward for your efforts.

name: autopurge
description: Allow Lord Bottington to automatically purge messages from a desired channel. (Admin Only)

name: moderate
description: Configure the moderation settings for the guild. (Admin Only)

name: promotion
description: Configure the promotion settings for your guild. (Admin Only)

name: starboard
description: Configure the settings for the starboard messages. (Admin Only)

name: streaming
description: Configure the settings for streaming statuses and notifications. (Admin Only)

name: timedembeds
description: Configure the settings for the timed embed messages. (Admin Only)

name: welcome
description: Configure the settings for the welcome messages. (Admin Only)

name: birthdaylist
description: Allow Lord Bottington to provide you a list of all dates of birth for your guild. (Admin Only)

name: getbirthday
description: Allow Lord Bottington to provide you with a user's date of birth.

name: removebirthday
description: Allow Lord Bottington to remove a date of birth from the register.

name: setbirthday
description: Manually input thy date of birth for Lord Bottington to commit to memory.

name: defineimproper
description: Lord Bottington will define a term for you in its improper (slang/urban) form.

name: defineproper
description: Lord Bottington will define a term for you in its proper form.

name: embedder
description: Send embedded messages to a channel. (Admin Only)

name: embedslist
description: List all the timed embeds created so far. (Admin Only)

name: giftgiving
description: Permit Lord Bottington to arrange a prize drawing for an item of your preference. (Admin Only)

name: iconography
description: Receive a list of the guild's iconography.

name: play
description: Lord Bottington will help you reach out to other like-minded players in search of game companions.

name: promote
description: Promote your guild (server).

name: purge
description: Purge messages from a desired channel. (Manage Messages Privileges)

name: search
description: Lord Bottington will demonstrate how to find something on the internet.

name: testpromote
description: Test the promotion for your guild. (Admin Only)

name: testwelcome
description: Test how Lord Bottington welcomes newcomers. (Admin Only)

name: weather
description: Allow Lord Bottington to retrieve the weather data for your location of choice.

name: banish
description: Lord Bottington will banish (ban) a member from the guild. (Admin Only)

name: remove
description: Lord Bottington will remove (kick) a member from the guild. (Admin Only)

name: silence
description: Lord Bottington will silence (mute) a member within the guild. (Admin Only)

name: unbanish
description: Lord Bottington will unbanish (unban) a member from the guild. (Admin Only)

name: unsilence
description: Lord Bottington will unsilence (unmute) a member within the guild. (Admin Only)

name: warn
description: Lord Bottington will warn a member within the guild. (Admin Only)

name: warninglist
description: Lord Bottington will provide a list of warnings for a member within the guild. (Admin Only)

name: warnremove
description: Lord Bottington will remove a warning from a member within the guild. (Admin Only)

name: boredom
description: Lord Bottington will provide a suggestion to help you alleviate your boredom.

name: compliment
description: Allow Lord Bottington to extend a sincere compliment to you or a fellow member.

name: converse
description: Ask Lord Bottington anything you would like.

name: crystalball
description: Seek guidance from the crystall ball and unveil the mysteries of the universe.

name: glyph
description: Lord Bottington will return a glyph (ascii art) of the desired selection.

name: greet
description: Greet Lord Bottington.

name: imagine
description: Allow Lord Bottington to generate an image based on your prompt.

name: minotar
description: Lord Bottington shall procure a Minecraft user's esteemed visage for you.

name: pictorialize
description: Lord Bottington shall transform avatars, images, and text into iconography or apply image effects.

name: roll
description: Roll dice with a chosen number of sides.

name: satireimage
description: Lord Bottington will retrieve a random satirical image for you.

name: teatime
description: Request a virtual tea service from Lord Bottington.

name: thought
description: Allow Lord Bottington to enlighten you with its vast knowledge.

name: battleship
description: Challenge Lord Bottington or another member of the guild to a game of Battleship.

name: connectfour
description: Challenge Lord Bottington or another member of the guild to a game of Connect Four.

name: mastermind
description: Decipher the secret code of Lord Bottington.

name: playerinfo
description: Check game related information for a member within the guild.

name: rps
description: Challenge Lord Bottington or another member of the guild to a game of rock, paper, scissors.

name: tictactoe
description: Challenge Lord Bottington or another member of the guild to a game of tic-tac-toe.

name: toptalent
description: Receive information on the top talent for games played within the guild.

name: wumpus
description: Go on a hunt to find and conquer the dreaded WumpusðŸ‘¹.

name: displaycase
description: Display your collected items for all to view.

name: earnings
description: Check remaining shillings and other game information for an individual within the guild.

name: exchange
description: Exchange collectible items with members of your guild.

name: shop
description: Purchase and sell items at the marketplace.
